00038 //BEGINNNING OF BUILDING INITIALIZATION FUNCTIONS
00039 void GameInitEditorBuildingInfo()
00040 {
00041       fBuildingShowRoofs = TRUE;
00042       fBuildingShowWalls = TRUE;
00043       fBuildingShowRoomInfo = FALSE;
00044       usCurrentMode = BUILDING_PLACE_WALLS;
00045       gubCurrRoomNumber = gubMaxRoomNumber = 1;
00046 }

00048 //BEGINNING OF BUILDING UTILITY FUNCTIONS
00049 void UpdateRoofsView()
00050 {
00051       INT32 x;
00052       UINT16 usType;
00053       for ( x = 0; x < WORLD_MAX; x++ )
00054       {
00055             for ( usType = FIRSTROOF; usType <= LASTSLANTROOF; usType++ )
00056             {
00057                   HideStructOfGivenType( x, usType, (BOOLEAN)(!fBuildingShowRoofs) );
00058             }
00059       }
00060       gfRenderWorld = TRUE;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void UpdateWallsView()
00064 {
00065       INT32 cnt;
00066       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
00067       {
00068             if ( fBuildingShowWalls )
00069             {
00070                   RemoveWallLevelnodeFlags( (INT16)cnt, LEVELNODE_HIDDEN );
00071             }
00072             else
00073             {
00074                   SetWallLevelnodeFlags( (INT16)cnt, LEVELNODE_HIDDEN );
00075             }
00076       }
00077       gfRenderWorld = TRUE;
00078 }

00096 
00097 //Uses a recursive method to elimate adjacent tiles of structure information.
00098 //The code will attempt to delete the current mapindex, then search using this method:
00099 //1) if there isn't structure info here, return.
00100 //2) if there is structure info here, delete it now.
00101 //3) KillBuilding at x-1, y.
00102 //4) KillBuilding at x  , y-1.
00103 //5) KillBuilding at x+1, y.
00104 //6) KillBuilding at x  , y+1.
00105 void KillBuilding( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00106 {
00107       BOOLEAN fFound = FALSE;
00108 
00109       if( !gfBasement )
00110             fFound |= RemoveAllRoofsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTTEXTURE, LASTITEM );     
00111       fFound |= RemoveAllLandsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTFLOOR, LASTFLOOR );
00112 
00113       EraseBuilding( iMapIndex );
00114       gubWorldRoomInfo[ iMapIndex ] = 0;
00115 
00116       if( !fFound )
00117       {
00118             if( gfBasement )
00119                   RebuildRoof( iMapIndex, 0 );
00120             return;
00121       }
00122 
00123       if( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( (UINT16)( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS ) ) )
00124             KillBuilding( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS );
00125       if( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( (UINT16)( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS ) ) )
00126             KillBuilding( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS );
00127       if( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( (UINT16)( iMapIndex + 1 ) ) )
00128             KillBuilding( iMapIndex + 1 );
00129       if( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( (UINT16)( iMapIndex - 1 ) ) )
00130             KillBuilding( iMapIndex - 1 );
00131 
00132       if( gfBasement )
00133             RebuildRoof( iMapIndex, 0 );
00134 }

00136 BUILDINGLAYOUTNODE *gpBuildingLayoutList = NULL;
00137 INT16 gsBuildingLayoutAnchorGridNo = -1;
00138 extern void RemoveBuildingLayout();
00139 
00140 void DeleteBuildingLayout()
00141 {
00142       BUILDINGLAYOUTNODE *curr;
00143       //Erases the cursors associated with them.
00144       RemoveBuildingLayout();
00145       while( gpBuildingLayoutList )
00146       {
00147             curr = gpBuildingLayoutList;
00148             gpBuildingLayoutList = gpBuildingLayoutList->next;
00149             MemFree( curr );
00150       }
00151       gpBuildingLayoutList = NULL;
00152       gsBuildingLayoutAnchorGridNo = -1;  
00153 }
00154 
00155 void BuildLayout( INT32 iMapIndex, INT32 iOffset )
00156 {
00157       BUILDINGLAYOUTNODE *curr;
00158       //First, validate the gridno
00159       iMapIndex += iOffset;
00160       if( iMapIndex < 0 && iMapIndex >= WORLD_COLS*WORLD_ROWS )
00161             return;
00162       //Now, check if there is a building here
00163       if( !BuildingAtGridNo( iMapIndex ) )
00164       {
00165             if( iOffset == 1 && !BuildingAtGridNo( iMapIndex - 1 ) )
00166                   return;
00167             if( iOffset == WORLD_COLS && !BuildingAtGridNo( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS ) )
00168                   return;
00169             if( iOffset == -1 && !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex ) )
00170                   return;
00171             if( iOffset == -WORLD_COLS && !GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex ) )
00172                   return;
00173       }
00174       //Now, check to make sure this gridno hasn't already been processed.
00175       curr = gpBuildingLayoutList;
00176       while( curr )
00177       {
00178             if( (INT16)iMapIndex == curr->sGridNo )
00179                   return;
00180             curr = curr->next;
00181       }
00182       //Good, it hasn't, so process it and add it to the head of the list.
00183       curr = (BUILDINGLAYOUTNODE*)MemAlloc( sizeof( BUILDINGLAYOUTNODE ) );
00184       Assert( curr );
00185       curr->sGridNo = (INT16)iMapIndex;
00186       curr->next = gpBuildingLayoutList;
00187       gpBuildingLayoutList = curr;
00188 
00189       //Use recursion to process the remainder.
00190       BuildLayout( iMapIndex, -WORLD_COLS );
00191       BuildLayout( iMapIndex, -1 );
00192       BuildLayout( iMapIndex, 1 );
00193       BuildLayout( iMapIndex, WORLD_COLS );
00194 }
00195 
00196 //The first step is copying a building.  After that, it either must be pasted or moved.
00197 void CopyBuilding( INT32 iMapIndex )
00198 {
00199       AssertMsg( !gpBuildingLayoutList, "Error:  Attempting to copy building multiple times." );
00200 
00201       //First step is to determine if we have a building in the area that we click.  If not, do nothing.
00202       if( !BuildingAtGridNo( iMapIndex ) )
00203             return;
00204       //Okay, a building does exist here to some undetermined capacity.  
00205       //Allocate the basic structure, then calculate the layout.  The head node is
00206       gpBuildingLayoutList = (BUILDINGLAYOUTNODE*)MemAlloc( sizeof( BUILDINGLAYOUTNODE ) );
00207       Assert( gpBuildingLayoutList );
00208       gpBuildingLayoutList->sGridNo = (INT16)iMapIndex;
00209       gpBuildingLayoutList->next = NULL;
00210 
00211       //Set the anchor point for this building -- this is where the user clicked.
00212       gsBuildingLayoutAnchorGridNo = (INT16)iMapIndex;
00213             
00214       //Now, recursively expand out while adding unique gridnos to our list.  The recursion will
00215       //terminate when complete.
00216       BuildLayout( iMapIndex, -WORLD_COLS );
00217       BuildLayout( iMapIndex, -1 );
00218       BuildLayout( iMapIndex, 1 );
00219       BuildLayout( iMapIndex, WORLD_COLS );
00220 
00221       //We have our layout.  Now depending on the mode, we will either move the building or
00222       //copy it.  The layout automatically gets deleted as soon as the user releases the mouse
00223       //button.
00224 }
00225 
00226 //depending on the offset, we will either sort in increasing order, or decreasing order.
00227 //This will prevent overlapping problems.
00228 void SortBuildingLayout( INT32 iMapIndex )
00229 {
00230       BUILDINGLAYOUTNODE *head, *curr, *prev, *prevBest, *best;
00231       INT32 iBestIndex;
00232       head = NULL;
00233       if( iMapIndex < gsBuildingLayoutAnchorGridNo )
00234       {     //Forward sort (in increasing order)
00235             while( gpBuildingLayoutList )
00236             {
00237                   iBestIndex = -1;
00238                   curr = gpBuildingLayoutList;
00239                   prev = NULL;
00240                   while( curr )
00241                   {
00242                         if( iBestIndex < curr->sGridNo )
00243                         {
00244                               iBestIndex = curr->sGridNo;
00245                               prevBest = prev;
00246                               best = curr;
00247                         }
00248                         prev = curr;
00249                         curr = curr->next;
00250                   }
00251                   //detach node from real list
00252                   if( prevBest )
00253                         prevBest->next = best->next;
00254                   if( best == gpBuildingLayoutList )
00255                         gpBuildingLayoutList = gpBuildingLayoutList->next;
00256                   //insert node into temp sorted list
00257                   best->next = head;
00258                   head = best;
00259             }
00260       }
00261       else
00262       { //Reverse sort (in decreasing order)
00263             while( gpBuildingLayoutList )
00264             {
00265                   iBestIndex = 100000;
00266                   curr = gpBuildingLayoutList;
00267                   prev = NULL;
00268                   while( curr )
00269                   {
00270                         if( iBestIndex > curr->sGridNo )
00271                         {
00272                               iBestIndex = curr->sGridNo;
00273                               prevBest = prev;
00274                               best = curr;
00275                         }
00276                         prev = curr;
00277                         curr = curr->next;
00278                   }
00279                   //detach node from real list
00280                   if( prevBest )
00281                         prevBest->next = best->next;
00282                   if( best == gpBuildingLayoutList )
00283                         gpBuildingLayoutList = gpBuildingLayoutList->next;
00284                   //insert node into temp sorted list
00285                   best->next = head;
00286                   head = best;
00287             }
00288       }
00289       //Now assign the newly sorted list back to the real list.
00290       gpBuildingLayoutList = head;
00291 }
00292 
00293 void PasteMapElementToNewMapElement( INT32 iSrcGridNo, INT32 iDstGridNo )
00294 {
00295       MAP_ELEMENT             *pSrcMapElement;
00296       LEVELNODE                     *pNode;
00297       UINT16                              usType;
00298       
00299       DeleteStuffFromMapTile( iDstGridNo );
00300       DeleteAllLandLayers( iDstGridNo );
00301 
00302       //Get a pointer to the src mapelement
00303       pSrcMapElement = &gpWorldLevelData[ iSrcGridNo ];
00304 
00305       //Go through each levelnode, and paste the info into the new gridno
00306       pNode = pSrcMapElement->pLandHead;
00307       while( pNode )
00308       {
00309             if( pNode == pSrcMapElement->pLandStart )
00310                   gpWorldLevelData[ iDstGridNo ].pLandStart = AddLandToTail( iDstGridNo, pNode->usIndex );
00311             else
00312                   AddLandToTail( iDstGridNo, pNode->usIndex );
00313             pNode = pNode->pNext;
00314       }
00315       pNode = pSrcMapElement->pObjectHead;
00316       while( pNode )
00317       {
00318             AddObjectToTail( iDstGridNo, pNode->usIndex );
00319             pNode = pNode->pNext;
00320       }
00321       pNode = pSrcMapElement->pStructHead;
00322       while( pNode )
00323       {
00324             AddStructToTail( iDstGridNo, pNode->usIndex );
00325             pNode = pNode->pNext;
00326       }
00327       pNode = pSrcMapElement->pShadowHead;
00328       while( pNode )
00329       {
00330             AddShadowToTail( iDstGridNo, pNode->usIndex );
00331             pNode = pNode->pNext;
00332       }
00333       pNode = pSrcMapElement->pRoofHead;
00334       while( pNode )
00335       {
00336             AddRoofToTail( iDstGridNo, pNode->usIndex );
00337             pNode = pNode->pNext;
00338       }
00339       pNode = pSrcMapElement->pOnRoofHead;
00340       while( pNode )
00341       {
00342             AddOnRoofToTail( iDstGridNo, pNode->usIndex );
00343             pNode = pNode->pNext;
00344       }
00345       pNode = pSrcMapElement->pTopmostHead;
00346       while( pNode )
00347       {
00348             if( pNode->usIndex != FIRSTPOINTERS1 )
00349                   AddTopmostToTail( iDstGridNo, pNode->usIndex );
00350             pNode = pNode->pNext;
00351       }
00352       for ( usType = FIRSTROOF; usType <= LASTSLANTROOF; usType++ )
00353       {
00354             HideStructOfGivenType( iDstGridNo, usType, (BOOLEAN)(!fBuildingShowRoofs) );
00355       }
00356 }
00357 
00358 void MoveBuilding( INT32 iMapIndex )
00359 {
00360       BUILDINGLAYOUTNODE *curr;
00361       INT32 iOffset;
00362       if( !gpBuildingLayoutList )
00363             return;
00364       SortBuildingLayout( iMapIndex );
00365       iOffset = iMapIndex - gsBuildingLayoutAnchorGridNo;
00366       //First time, set the undo gridnos to everything effected.
00367       curr = gpBuildingLayoutList;
00368       while( curr )
00369       {
00370             AddToUndoList( curr->sGridNo );
00371             AddToUndoList( curr->sGridNo + iOffset );
00372             curr = curr->next;
00373       }
00374       //Now, move the building
00375       curr = gpBuildingLayoutList;
00376       while( curr )
00377       {
00378             PasteMapElementToNewMapElement( curr->sGridNo, curr->sGridNo + iOffset );
00379             DeleteStuffFromMapTile( curr->sGridNo );
00380             curr = curr->next;
00381       }
00382       MarkWorldDirty();
00383 }
00384 
00385 void PasteBuilding( INT32 iMapIndex )
00386 {
00387       BUILDINGLAYOUTNODE *curr;
00388       INT32 iOffset;
00389       if( !gpBuildingLayoutList )
00390             return;
00391       SortBuildingLayout( iMapIndex );
00392       iOffset = iMapIndex - gsBuildingLayoutAnchorGridNo;
00393       curr = gpBuildingLayoutList;
00394       //First time, set the undo gridnos to everything effected.
00395       while( curr )
00396       {
00397             AddToUndoList( curr->sGridNo );
00398             AddToUndoList( curr->sGridNo + iOffset );
00399             curr = curr->next;
00400       }
00401       //Now, paste the building (no smoothing)
00402       curr = gpBuildingLayoutList;
00403       while( curr )
00404       {
00405             PasteMapElementToNewMapElement( curr->sGridNo, curr->sGridNo + iOffset );
00406             curr = curr->next;
00407       }
00408       MarkWorldDirty();
00409 }

00411 typedef struct ROOFNODE
00412 {
00413       INT32 iMapIndex;
00414       struct ROOFNODE *next;
00415 }ROOFNODE;
00416 
00417 ROOFNODE *gpRoofList = NULL;
00418 
00419 void ReplaceRoof( INT32 iMapIndex, UINT16 usRoofType )
00420 {
00421       ROOFNODE *curr;
00422       //First, validate the gridno
00423       if( iMapIndex < 0 && iMapIndex >= WORLD_COLS*WORLD_ROWS )
00424             return;
00425       //Now, check if there is a floor here
00426       if( !FloorAtGridNo( iMapIndex ) )
00427             return;
00428       //Now, check to make sure this gridno hasn't already been processed.
00429       curr = gpRoofList;
00430       while( curr )
00431       {
00432             if( iMapIndex == curr->iMapIndex )
00433                   return;
00434             curr = curr->next;
00435       }
00436       //Good, it hasn't, so process it and add it to the head of the list.
00437       curr = (ROOFNODE*)MemAlloc( sizeof( ROOFNODE ) );
00438       Assert( curr );
00439       curr->iMapIndex = iMapIndex;
00440       curr->next = gpRoofList;
00441       gpRoofList = curr;
00442 
00443       RebuildRoofUsingFloorInfo( iMapIndex, usRoofType );
00444 
00445       //Use recursion to process the remainder.
00446       ReplaceRoof( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS, usRoofType );
00447       ReplaceRoof( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS, usRoofType );
00448       ReplaceRoof( iMapIndex - 1, usRoofType );
00449       ReplaceRoof( iMapIndex + 1, usRoofType );
00450 }
00451 
00452 void ReplaceBuildingWithNewRoof( INT32 iMapIndex )
00453 {
00454       UINT16 usRoofType;
00455       ROOFNODE *curr;
00456       //Not in normal editor mode, then can't do it.
00457       if( gfBasement || gfCaves )
00458             return;
00459       //if we don't have a floor here, then we can't replace the roof!
00460       if( !FloorAtGridNo( iMapIndex ) )
00461             return;
00462       //Extract the selected roof type.
00463       usRoofType = (UINT16)SelSingleNewRoof[ iCurBank ].uiObject;
00464 
00465       //now start building a linked list of all nodes visited -- start the first node.
00466       gpRoofList = (ROOFNODE*)MemAlloc( sizeof( ROOFNODE ) );
00467       Assert( gpRoofList );
00468       gpRoofList->iMapIndex = iMapIndex;
00469       gpRoofList->next = 0;
00470       RebuildRoofUsingFloorInfo( iMapIndex, usRoofType );
00471 
00472       //Use recursion to process the remainder.
00473       ReplaceRoof( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS, usRoofType );
00474       ReplaceRoof( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS, usRoofType );
00475       ReplaceRoof( iMapIndex - 1, usRoofType );
00476       ReplaceRoof( iMapIndex + 1, usRoofType );
00477 
00478       //Done, so delete the list.
00479       while( gpRoofList )
00480       {
00481             curr = gpRoofList;
00482             gpRoofList = gpRoofList->next;
00483             MemFree( curr );
00484       }
00485       gpRoofList = NULL;
00486 }

00505 void InitDoorEditing( INT32 iMapIndex )
00506 {
00507       DOOR *pDoor;
00508       if( !DoorAtGridNo( iMapIndex ) && !OpenableAtGridNo( iMapIndex ) )
00509             return;
00510       gfEditingDoor = TRUE;
00511       iDoorMapIndex = iMapIndex;
00512       DisableEditorTaskbar();
00513       MSYS_DefineRegion( &DoorRegion, 0, 0, 640, 480, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH-2, 0, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
00514       iDoorButton[ DOOR_BACKGROUND ] =
00515             CreateTextButton( 0, 0, 0, 0, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT, 200, 130, 240, 100, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH - 1, 
00516             BUTTON_NO_CALLBACK, BUTTON_NO_CALLBACK );
00517       DisableButton( iDoorButton[ DOOR_BACKGROUND ] );
00518       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( iDoorButton[ DOOR_BACKGROUND ], DISABLED_STYLE_NONE );
00519       iDoorButton[ DOOR_OKAY ] =
00520             CreateTextButton(L"Okay", FONT12POINT1, FONT_BLACK, FONT_BLACK, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT,
00521             330, 195, 50, 30, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, 
00522             DoorOkayCallback );
00523       iDoorButton[ DOOR_CANCEL ] =
00524             CreateTextButton(L"Cancel", FONT12POINT1, FONT_BLACK, FONT_BLACK, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT,
00525             385, 195, 50, 30, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, 
00526             DoorCancelCallback );
00527       InitTextInputModeWithScheme( DEFAULT_SCHEME );
00528       AddTextInputField( 210, 155, 25, 16, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, L"0", 3, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00529       AddTextInputField( 210, 175, 25, 16, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, L"0", 2, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00530       AddTextInputField( 210, 195, 25, 16, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, L"0", 2, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00531       iDoorButton[ DOOR_LOCKED ] = 
00532             CreateCheckBoxButton(   210, 215, "EDITOR//SmCheckbox.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, DoorToggleLockedCallback );
00533 
00534       pDoor = FindDoorInfoAtGridNo( iDoorMapIndex );
00535       if( pDoor )
00536       {
00537             if( pDoor->fLocked )
00538             {
00539                   ButtonList[ iDoorButton[ DOOR_LOCKED ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00540             }
00541             SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 0, pDoor->ubLockID );
00542             SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 1, pDoor->ubTrapID );
00543             SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 2, pDoor->ubTrapLevel );
00544       }
00545       else
00546       {
00547             ButtonList[ iDoorButton[ DOOR_LOCKED ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00548       }
00549 }
00550 
00551 void ExtractAndUpdateDoorInfo()
00552 {
00553       LEVELNODE* pNode;
00554       INT32 num;
00555       DOOR door;
00556       BOOLEAN fCursor = FALSE;
00557       BOOLEAN fCursorExists = FALSE;
00558 
00559       memset( &door, 0, sizeof( DOOR ) );
00560 
00561       door.sGridNo = (INT16)iDoorMapIndex;
00562 
00563       num = min( GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 0 ), NUM_LOCKS-1 );
00564       door.ubLockID = (UINT8)num;
00565       SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 0, num );
00566       if( num >= 0 )
00567             fCursor = TRUE;
00568 
00569       num = min( max( GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 1 ), 0 ), 10 );
00570       door.ubTrapID = (UINT8)num;
00571       SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 1, num );
00572       if( num ) 
00573             fCursor = TRUE;
00574 
00575       num = min( max( GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 2 ), 0 ), 20 );
00576       if( door.ubTrapID && !num )
00577             num = 1;  //Can't have a trap without a traplevel!
00578       door.ubTrapLevel = (UINT8)num;
00579       SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 2, num );
00580       if( num ) 
00581             fCursor = TRUE;
00582 
00583       if( ButtonList[ iDoorButton[ DOOR_LOCKED ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON )
00584       {
00585             door.fLocked = TRUE;          
00586       }
00587       else
00588       {
00589             door.fLocked = FALSE;
00590       }
00591 
00592       //Find out if we have a rotating key cursor (we will either add one or remove one)
00593       pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ iDoorMapIndex ].pTopmostHead;
00594       while( pNode )
00595       {
00596             if( pNode->usIndex == ROTATINGKEY1 )
00597             {
00598                   fCursorExists = TRUE;
00599                   break;
00600             }
00601             pNode = pNode->pNext;
00602       }
00603       if( fCursor )
00604       { //we have a valid door, so add it (or replace existing)
00605             if( !fCursorExists )
00606                   AddTopmostToHead( iDoorMapIndex, ROTATINGKEY1 );
00607             //If the door already exists, the new information will replace it.
00608             AddDoorInfoToTable( &door );
00609       }
00610       else
00611       { //if a door exists here, remove it.
00612             if( fCursorExists )
00613                   RemoveAllTopmostsOfTypeRange( iDoorMapIndex, ROTATINGKEY, ROTATINGKEY );
00614             RemoveDoorInfoFromTable( iDoorMapIndex );
00615       }
00616 
00617 }
00618 
00619 void FindNextLockedDoor()
00620 {
00621       DOOR *pDoor;
00622       INT32 i;
00623       for( i = iDoorMapIndex + 1; i < WORLD_MAX; i++ )
00624       {
00625             pDoor = FindDoorInfoAtGridNo( i );
00626             if( pDoor )
00627             {
00628                   CenterScreenAtMapIndex( i );
00629                   iDoorMapIndex = i;
00630                   return;
00631             }
00632       }
00633       for( i = 0; i <= iDoorMapIndex; i++ )
00634       {
00635             pDoor = FindDoorInfoAtGridNo( i );
00636             if( pDoor )
00637             {
00638                   CenterScreenAtMapIndex( i );
00639                   iDoorMapIndex = i;
00640                   return;
00641             }
00642       }
00643 }
00644 
00645 void RenderDoorEditingWindow()
00646 {
00647       InvalidateRegion( 200, 130, 440, 230 );
00648       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00649       SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00650       SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00651       SetFontBackground( 0 );
00652       mprintf( 210, 140, L"Editing lock attributes at map index %d.", iDoorMapIndex );
00653 
00654       SetFontForeground( FONT_GRAY2 );
00655       mprintf( 238, 160, L"Lock ID" );
00656       mprintf( 238, 180, L"Trap Type" );
00657       mprintf( 238, 200, L"Trap Level" );
00658       mprintf( 238, 218, L"Locked" );
00659 }
00660 
00661 void KillDoorEditing()
00662 {
00663       INT32 i;
00664       EnableEditorTaskbar();
00665       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &DoorRegion );
00666       for( i = 0; i < NUM_DOOR_BUTTONS; i++ )
00667             RemoveButton( iDoorButton[ i ] );
00668       gfEditingDoor = FALSE;
00669       KillTextInputMode();
00670 }

00672 void DoorOkayCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00673 {
00674       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00675       {
00676             ExtractAndUpdateDoorInfo();
00677             KillDoorEditing();
00678       }
00679 }
00680 
00681 void DoorCancelCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00682 {
00683       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00684       {
00685             KillDoorEditing();
00686       }
00687 }

00691       //handled in ExtractAndUpdateDoorInfo();

00693 
00694 void AddLockedDoorCursors()
00695 {
00696       DOOR *pDoor;
00697       INT i;
00698       for( i = 0; i < gubNumDoors; i++ )
00699       {
00700             pDoor = &DoorTable[ i ];
00701             AddTopmostToHead( pDoor->sGridNo, ROTATINGKEY1 );
00702       }
00703 }
00704 
00705 void RemoveLockedDoorCursors()
00706 {
00707       DOOR *pDoor;
00708       INT i;
00709       LEVELNODE* pNode;
00710       LEVELNODE* pTemp;
00711       for( i = 0; i < gubNumDoors; i++ )
00712       {
00713             pDoor = &DoorTable[ i ];
00714             pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ pDoor->sGridNo ].pTopmostHead;
00715             while( pNode )
00716             {
00717                   if( pNode->usIndex == ROTATINGKEY1 )
00718                   {
00719                         pTemp = pNode;
00720                         pNode = pNode->pNext;
00721                         RemoveTopmost( pDoor->sGridNo, pTemp->usIndex );
00722                   }
00723                   else
00724                         pNode = pNode->pNext;
00725             }
00726       }
00727 }
00728 
00729 void SetupTextInputForBuildings()
00730 {
00731       UINT16 str[4];
00732       InitTextInputModeWithScheme( DEFAULT_SCHEME );
00733       AddUserInputField( NULL );  //just so we can use short cut keys while not typing.
00734       swprintf( str, L"%d", gubMaxRoomNumber );
00735       AddTextInputField( 410, 400, 25, 15, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, str, 3, INPUTTYPE_NUMERICSTRICT );
00736 }
00737 
00738 void ExtractAndUpdateBuildingInfo()
00739 {
00740       UINT16 str[4];
00741       INT32 temp;
00742       //extract light1 colors
00743       temp = min( GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 1 ), 255 );
00744       if( temp != -1 )
00745       {
00746             gubCurrRoomNumber = (UINT8)temp;
00747       }
00748       else
00749       {
00750             gubCurrRoomNumber = 0;
00751       }
00752       swprintf( str, L"%d", gubCurrRoomNumber );
00753       SetInputFieldStringWith16BitString( 1, str );
00754       SetActiveField( 0 );
00755 }
